plot: Doris Ruridou is young princess who had just entered Teito Academy. She is also a Panzer, a person with special abilities and fights with a weapon called a 'tool'. Shortly after entering, her older sister shows up to teach her how to fight as a Panzer against other Panzers who challenge her.
ending_theme: "Drill De Runrun Kururunrun" by Midori Kawana, Mayuko Omimura
